context: Chewy, Inc. is a online pet products retailer focused on pet food, supplies, pharmacy, and healthcare services. Pet healthcare ecosystem. Subscription services and personalization.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Largest e-commerce with significant pet category share

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Omnichannel retailer with value pet products

competitors.name: Costco
competitors.notes: Value pet products in warehouse stores

competitors.name: Tractor Supply
competitors.notes: Rural retailer with growing pet category
